attributes.action: Stop Teacher Training days within term time .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a parent of 4 children 2 of which are at high school I would like to petition the government to put pressure on the teachers unions, head teachers and local government to stop the practice of having ‘training’ days the day before or day after school holidays. 

Training should be taken within the combined 13-week period when the schools are closed. As working parents we find it difficult  along with many others to cope with covering the extra days out of school.
